import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { fetchMovieDetail, fetchMovieVideos, fetchMovieCredits, fetchSimilarMovie, fetchSessionMovie, } from "../../service"; import "react-bootstrap-carousel/dist/react-bootstrap-carousel.css"; import { Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import ReactPlayer from "react-player"; import ReactStars from "react-rating-stars-component"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../home/Aminition/Home.css"; import dateFormat from 'dateformat'; export function MovieDetail({ match }) { let params = match.params; let genres = []; const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const [detail, setDetail] = useState([]); const [video, setVideo] = useState([]); const [casts, setCasts] = useState([]); const [sessions, setSession] = useState([]); const [similarMovie, setSimilarMovie] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchAPI = async () => { setDetail(await fetchMovieDetail(params.id)); setVideo(await fetchMovieVideos(params.id)); setCasts(await fetchMovieCredits(params.id)); setSession(await fetchSessionMovie(params.id)); setSimilarMovie(await fetchSimilarMovie(params.id)); }; fetchAPI(); }, [params.id]); genres = detail.genres; const MoviePalyerModal = (props) => { const youtubeUrl = "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v="; return ( {detail.title} ); }; let genresList; if (genres) { genresList = genres.map((g, i) => { return (
    • ); }); } const listCredits = casts.slice(0, 20).map((c, i) => { return (

    {c.name}

    ); }); const similarMovieList = similarMovie.slice(0, 30).map((item, index) => { return (

    {item.title}

    Rated: {item.rating}

    ); }); const listSessionMovie = sessions.slice(0, 1).map((c, i) => { return (
    {c.name}
    Nm {c.date} | Tp {c.episode_count}

    {c.name} ca {detail.name} c cng chiu ngy {dateFormat(c.date)}

    SHOW ALL
